verses.name: Luke 18:40
verses.text: And Jesus stood, and commanded him to be brought unto him: and when he was come near, he asked him,

verses.name: Luke 18:41
verses.text: Saying, What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee? And he said, Lord, that I may receive my sight.

verses.name: Luke 18:42
verses.text: And Jesus said unto him, Receive thy sight: thy faith hath saved thee.

verses.name: Luke 18:43
verses.text: And immediately he received his sight, and followed him, glorifying God: and all the people, when they saw it, gave praise unto God.
